Text.Page:
Now it's time to kill ovoliths. Go to the Sinestral Manor and attack {@LinkCreature:16#2401#ovoliths}, {@LinkCreature:16#2402#lurking ovoliths}, and {@LinkCreature:16#2501#massive ovoliths}.

Report to Gisa when your mission is complete.

Excellent! Thank you for the work you've put in here.

Please, take this.

I need claws if I'm to offer payment.

I do not reward the bringing of air.
